PUBLIC_RECIPES.name: Supreme Pizza
PUBLIC_RECIPES.description: Make pizza night super duper out of this world with homemade pizza. This recipe is supreme with vegetables and two types of meat. Yum!

PUBLIC_RECIPES.name: Classic Burger
PUBLIC_RECIPES.description: Sink you teath into a delicious restaurant-style, hambuger recipe made from lean beef. Skip the prepackaged patties and take the extra time to craft up your own, and that little extra effort will be worth it.

PUBLIC_RECIPES.name: Chicken Biryani
PUBLIC_RECIPES.description: Chicken Biryani is a bold and flavorful Indian dish with crazy tender bites of chicken with bell peppers in a deliciously spiced and fragrant rice.

PUBLIC_RECIPES.name: Ch. Chow Mein
PUBLIC_RECIPES.description: A great Chow Mein comes down to the sauce - it takes more than just soy sauce and sugar! Jam packed with a surprsing amount of hidden vegetables, customize this Chicken Chow Mein recipe using your protien of choice!
